## Validation

- [ ] `npm run quality:check` (or not needed with reason)
- [ ] Related tests were run for changed behavior
- [ ] For docs changes: `npm run docs:quality`
- [ ] For docs app changes: `npm --workspace ./apps/docs run build`

## Docs Quality Checklist (only if docs changed)

- [ ] I followed `/en/docs/contributors/project/docs-writing-standard`
- [ ] The page remains task-focused and readable for first-time users
- [ ] `title` and `description` frontmatter are present and accurate
- [ ] Internal links are valid
- [ ] Examples are runnable or clearly marked as schematic
- [ ] No keyword stuffing or crawler-only filler text was introduced
